text:
Your ChatGPT prompt is stuck at level 3.

But the magic happens at level 5:

✦ The right model (thinking).
✦ The right context (who are you?)
✦ The right role (who should answer?)
✦ The right hacks (/search + "think deeply).
✦ The right ask (start with ideas, not output).

Here's the prompt template for a level 5:

(make sure to use GPT-5 thinking model, top left)

___

/search Think deeply.

Act as [role needed]. Use our chat history & my memories to [task] about [what]. [Additional context], but I feel [problem]. Before [task that I think I want], how could we focus on the 20% that yields 80% of the results? Ask me the right questions to determine how to [solve problem].

___

I wrote a guide on prompt engineering, and also how to start with AI at https://lnkd.in/d2BQW-w6.

You must be a paid member of my Substack (it's $200 per year). You will get access to my member-only chat (like a Slack), and all of my previous courses, videos & how-to-ai guides.
